returns._0: Attributes properties of a single item

params.recipient: Address which is minted a Shadowling
params.seed: Psuedorandom number hopefully generated from commit-reveal scheme
params.tokenId: Token with `id` to mint. Maps id to individual item ids in ItemIds

params.seed: Pseudorandom value hopefully generated from a commit-reveal scheme

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns._0: Each item as a string from a Shadowling with `tokenId`

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

attributes(uint256).notice: Returns the attributes properties of a `tokenId`

claim(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Mints Shadowlings to `msg.sender`, cannot mint 0 tokenId

modify(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Modifies the attributes of Shadowling with `tokenId` using the type of currency

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Returns an SVG for the provided token id
